mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.username, u.email, u.mobile, u.password, u.status, u.create_time createTime, u.sex sex, u.department_id departmentId, u.last_login_time lastLoginTime, u.modify_time modifyTime, u.description, u.avatar, d.dept_name deptName, GROUP_CONCAT(r.role_id) roleId, GROUP_CONCAT(r.role_name) roleName FROM rms_user u LEFT JOIN t_dept d ON (u.dept_id = d.dept_id) LEFT JOIN rms_user_role ur ON (u.user_id = ur.user_id) LEFT JOIN rms_role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE u.username = #{username} group by u.username,u.id,u.email,u.mobile,u.password, u.status,u.create_time,u.sex,u.department_id ,u.last_login_time,u.modify_time,u.description,u.avatar
select id, department_id departmentId from rms_user_data_permission where user_id = #{userId}
